name: Janbo's Towerdefense
description:
This is my entry for the current AGK Comunity Competition.
Keep in mind that this is still a work in progress and pretty much everything is subject to change.

The Game:

In this Towerdefense game you have nearly endless freedom where to place your Towers and create long mazes while you have to take the surroundings into account. You can choose between different Towers and hold back the endless waves of enemys in completely random generated maps and try to beat your personal highscore or compete with others for the top rank on the global Highscore list !

Controlls:
  • WASD - Move camera
  • Scroll - Select next Tower
  • Left Click - Build/Sell Tower
  • ESC - Pause menu
  • Info Button - Show Tooltips
  • Tower Button - Select the Tower
